app_descript:
Brief:

Gametime provides an effortless and cost-effective way to score tickets for a broad range of live events. With falling prices as the event time gets closer and the ability to purchase tickets well after the event's start, Gametime ensures fans never miss out on the fun. Backed by a robust service policy, no hidden fees, and easy resale of tickets, this app is a fan's best friend for experiencing sports, concerts, theater, and more IRL.

Transform your event-going experience with simplicity and savings. Shop, compare, and save with Gametime.
